Title: Relates to insurance coverage for mental health and substance use disorder services
Summary: Requires that insurance coverage for mental health and substance use disorder services be compliant with the federal Paul Wellstone and Pete Domenici Mental Health Parity and Addiction Equity Act of 2008 and its implementing regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health insurance policies conform to the requirements of the federal Paul Wellstone and Pete Domenici Mental Health Parity and Addiction Equity Act of 2008
